website_summaries.verdict: An option that gives good support and stabilization with occasional sizing issues.
pros: Users remark on the comfortable and adjustable fit of this brace, and most felt it gives efficient stabilization and support
It also stands out for its quality material and can be worn for extended periods
cons: A few felt that the overall design could be improved, some had difficulty with the sizing

customer_reviews.title: Had hi hopes
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a different brace first but didn't like the way it cut under the are. Saw theach design of this and thought it would work much better. It did for a couple months but then the material that the velcro sticks to wore out and now I can't keep it strapped around my chest rendering it useless. If that problem could be fixed it would be a decent brace. I used mine pretty frequently...5 days a week in the gym. Major design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: royalty

customer_reviews.title: I like the design but it was too small
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this brace- except- I couldn’t get on. I bought the size they recommended in their sizing chart and I should have bout 2 sizes bigger. It barely fit around my chest and the bicep cuff barely fit over my elbow. I like the design. I think it would probably work if it fit. They refunded my money quickly but I mailed it back a couple weeks ago and it still has the return as “in progress” so I’m hesitant to buy a bigger one until this is listed as “return complete”.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H.

customer_reviews.title: Helped my linebacker son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son during his senior football season after a bad hit that caused his shoulder to pop out and back in. It's the only thing that made him feel good enough to return to playing. Made well, stayed in place and did its job. He was the middle linebacker and takes hard hits in the trenches. Without this, he wouldn't have been able to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca N,

customer_reviews.title: How long is a velcro surface last?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brace in January, to be used up until my shoulder surgery in June. The surface that the velcro tab holds on to, will no longer allow the Velcro to grab the surface. In other words this does not see to be used to much. It is now June and I still need to use this brace. I would like to hear a comment from the manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L

customer_reviews.title: but I continued to wear it because it felt like it supported my shoulder nicely
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is suppose to. Wore it snowboarding because I had surgery on my shoulder (torn labrum). Granted I went 5-6 months after surgery so may not have even needed it but wore it anyway. Can say I think it did help me one time when I fell. Got a little uncomfortable after wearing it all day because it started to dig in my side a little (not to terribly), but I continued to wear it because it felt like it supported my shoulder nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was so hopeful, now I'm just full.
customer_reviews.text: Velcro has torn away at the brace quickly and now is nearly unable to hold position any more, took less than 2 months to become useless. Before it failed to do its designed task, to get proper support you had to snug strap pretty tight causin my stomach to get compressed causing G.I. issues. Lastly it has no breathability, with or without clothing it gets hot sweaty and smelly. I do not recommend this of you have any palsy or nerve damage, as this will not provide a long term comfortable solution.
customer_reviews.author: T.Feehan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brace for working out
customer_reviews.text: It was a little uncomfortable at first but after wearing if a few times i have grown use to it. I use this for working out and haven’t noticed any troubles with range of motion. I offers a lot of support and I haven’t had near as much pain while working out since I started to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Warehime

customer_reviews.title: Just enough movement
customer_reviews.text: I tore a ligament in my shoulder and was told by the Dr. to not use it for 3-6 months. That wasn’t possible because my work depends on me being able to move around if needed. Thanks to this brace I was able to move just enough to get my work done and not make my injury worse.
customer_reviews.author: JP44

customer_reviews.title: Goalie's security blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I have read reviews about it falling apart, and I have the exact opposite! I dislocated my shoulder playing hockey about a year ago. Now, I won't play without it. I play a few hours a week, and it gets washed every week. 1 year later it looks brand new. Buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Rotator cuff and arthritis pain minimized!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My husband strained his rotator cuff and has arthritis in his shoulder. His work is physically demanding on his shoulder, so I bought him this. The pain in his shoulder is greatly decreased! Before he wore this, he had to come home and ice/heat his shoulder all night and could not sleep because of the pain. With chiropractic care and this brace, he has minimal pain!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Glad I Bought It!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first shoulder brace I've purchased. Had it about a month now. It has REALLY helped my shoulder to heal from a moderate AC injury. Very comfortable to wear. Helps to have someone around to adjust the velco around back so it fits perfectly, the first time -- not too tight, not too loose. You won't have to keep adjusting it. But it's easy to loosen if you want to give your shoulder a break for a little while without taking it off. Been wearing it at night, as well. It keeps me from getting into weird positions for my injured shoulder while sleeping. Intelligently designed. Very versatile. Super happy with it! No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cymry

customer_reviews.title: Bionic arm gear!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I do love this brace. Ruptured my Long arm bicep tendon....bye, bye! So this rig, along with KT tape helps to make up for the missing tendon. I play tennis 3 hours a day wearing this rig and it does not inhibit my movement one bit. Actually it snugs my arm and shoulder socket up nicely, since it is now a really sloppy joint since the loss of the tendon which was the front attachment of the arm to the shoulder joint!
customer_reviews.author: POPPOP

customer_reviews.title: Had shoulder surgery this works amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ive had third degree reconstructive shoulder surgery, and this brace is the best brace for support, i have both mcdavid braces, and a ueasy brace. This brace beats all for support and compression. The only draw back is the tight fit in the under arm but other than that its great. I do have yet to try the shock doctor brace but this one so far works for me i bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fit is really good as you can adjust it many ways. Fabric quality is also nice; smooth non irritating fabric. Provides great support. It is thick and you will sweat alot. The tabs have this thick rubber on them and while it's great for gripping so you can adjust the straps or take it off, they dig into my ribs and is extremely uncomfortable. I just can't wear it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: this shoulder brace works pretty well but i think the sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: this shoulder brace works pretty well but i think the sizing is off, it cuts off my arms circulation but it isnt big enough to go around my chest, if your moving around constantly then you wont notice this, out of all the shoulder braces i tried this was the best one, it could just use some revisions
customer_reviews.author: Gino Cavallaro

customer_reviews.title: this one gives the best stability/range balance
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of basketball. And recently tweaked my shoulder on a rebound. I've tried so many shoulder braces. But. this one gives the best stability/range balance. It's like an ankle brace for your shoulder. Other ones were either too bulky or had no stabilizing effect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Had people at the gym and trainers ...
customer_reviews.text: Magical. Tons of pain in my shoulder as I do weight training regularly and ended up injuring myself through stupidity. Doctor told me to stop working out for awhile to let it heal. Instead I got this magical device and forgot what shoulder pain means. Can even wear under my shirt and not noticeable. Good stuff. Had people at the gym and trainers ask where to buy it. Will buy again once this one wears out (it is durable btw, I wear it regularly to the gym, (pretty much daily).
customer_reviews.author: Roman M

customer_reviews.title: He has torn rotator cuff that he's refusing surgery for so this was my next best option to make him as comfortable as possible
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves. Did have some issues with abrasions but only because he tried to live in the brace literally. He has torn rotator cuff that he's refusing surgery for so this was my next best option to make him as comfortable as possible. He was able to begin weight training with it on again says it feels a lot better when wearing it. Easy to put on. Just make sure you are measuring before purchase because it does fit like a glove on him in a large and I'm sure once his muscles build up again I will be going up sizes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your shoulder is loose this is life changing
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 shoulder surgerys (labrum repairs) and hundreds of dislocations on my right shoulder. Shoulder is still loose and pops out with certain range of motion. I use this when snowboarding and my shoulder regularly slips out. This brace supports my shoulder beautifully. I cannot recommend this enough! I forget about my shoulder issues and can focus on riding. I was skeptical when buying this but I have been blown away. Seriously life changing
customer_reviews.author: Riley karlstrand

customer_reviews.title: Worked well with a torn rotator cuff
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband while he healed from a torn rotator cuff. It helped stabilize his shoulder while he worked. It seemed to reduce the sensation of further tearing. It also seem that his injury healed more rapidly once he started wearing the brace. He liked that he could adjust the support for whatever he needed that hour/day.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_Web

customer_reviews.title: this brace fits much better. I sent the large back and kept the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these at the same time because I got mixed reviews from how this brace fits based on body type and size. I am 5'11, 178 lbs., slender build with fairly broad shoulders. If you're close to my body size/type, you will find that this brace is a little loose fitting when worn on bare skin. When worn over top of a thin, tight athletic shirt, this brace fits much better. I sent the large back and kept the medium. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tendonitis in my shoulder and I love this brace. I personally don't wear it during activities since I am very particular about my ability to have free range of motion and this brace is a bit restrictive I still love it so much. Whenever my shoulder is hurting I can out this brace on and more times than not it makes the pain go away by itself!
customer_reviews.author: hi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoulder brace
customer_reviews.text: I injured my shoulder playing roller derby a few months ago and needed a good brace to wear during practice. This brace was recommended to me by another derby friend and it amazing. It supports my shoulder just enough so I can't hurt it as easily yet I still have enough movement to play my sport. If you're a female looking for a good shoulder brace this is a perfect one. I'm a 36D and the large fits me very comfortably, no awkwardness in fitting over my chest.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shoulder dislocation
customer_reviews.text: I am a 40R and bought a large. Fit perfectly. If in between, go next size up. I severely dislocated my shoulder. This helps me play golf without subluxation and restricts odd movements. If you've dislocated your shoulder this is a great option in order to help provide stability
customer_reviews.author: DonJuan

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after a physical therapist recommended a $200 option. Was just looking for something to remind me I'm not a youngster anymore while paddling whitewater. It certainly does that and more. Had both elbow & shoulder work done & don't need a repeat. Don't hesitate to to bump up a size especially if you plan to where something under it. Provides enough support to keep me floating. Obviously not intended to prevent full movement.
customer_reviews.author: m. christ

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: It has taken some adjustment and getting used to. I do still feel the pain when I run, but it's not as bad as it was. I think adjusting it over time will only continue to help. I'm not sure how long the Velcro will last with the constant on and off, but it certainly is better than no brace at all. I have a terribly unstable shoulder that only lets me run about 2 miles before it's throbbing. This helps hold that pain off for another mile or so and keeps it manageable.
customer_reviews.author: sn00py

customer_reviews.title: Allows Mobility
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who is a painter, and he said he likes being able to adjust the tension and the brace still allows him to complete his work with no hindrance.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid Gym goer and I have injured/tweak my left shoulder. So I bought this for support. I've used it during workouts and wear it sometimes when I'm at work. I would say to wear it over a compression shirt and not on your skin. For me it would irritate my skin if i didn't wear it over a shirt. Pros: -Gives great shoulder support. -Fully adjustable. Cons: -Needs a Buddy to help adjusting
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: You Get What you Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these braces as both shoulders have been damaged and I needed them to help control the movement in my arms. Literally within 1 month of receiving them the material on the arm of one of them has pulled away from the neoprene underlayer. With regard to putting it on, once you have it set I found it relatively easy to put on, although the main chest velcro attachment is hard to pull off which is awkward if you have a damaged shoulder. Overall I'd give it a C for an ok try, but as it's not an expensive product that probably explains why it hasn't lasted long.
customer_reviews.author: D R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for golf
customer_reviews.text: This brace worked great for a shoulder injury from golf. Made it through a member guest weekend thanks to this brace.
customer_reviews.author: Joe N

customer_reviews.title: I wear medium size shirts so I bought a large ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear medium size shirts so I bought a large one of these. As others have said the arm straps are ridiculously tight. I do work out, but I don't have huge biceps. I have no idea who this product is sized for. The disappointing part is that the chest part does succeed in assisting with my persistent shoulder discomfort, but I am unable to wear it for any length without my arm hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Foster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoulder Brace
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Brace for shoulder and arm injuries. It keeps the shoulder in place, making sure that you don't injure it again. If it is a bad injury though, you should see a doctor. I highly recommend this product, it absolutely keeps your shoulder in place without movement so that it can heal.
customer_reviews.author: Mechele Parker

customer_reviews.title: Stability good, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, provides great stability for unstable shoulder joint. I've used this on both shoulders (labral injury and rotator cuff injury), and it works for either. Provides enough venting that it doesn't get really gross in the summer. Buy a size up if you're on the edge of the measurement guidelines - it's more comfortable, and the velcro adjustment points allow for a lot of flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Lómëar

customer_reviews.title: Not for women
customer_reviews.text: If you are a women, and has any chest larger than an A cup...it will not fit.. cuts into you breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Thor
customer_reviews.text: I love this brace. It keeps my arthritis and tendonitis at bay when working out.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Best brace of it's type
customer_reviews.text: I tried several other braces but none even came close this one. It cost more than some other brands but with it I can do things. without I can only watch. If your problem is a torn Rotator Cuff this brace is the answer. HG
customer_reviews.author: Harry G

customer_reviews.title: This brace gives me great support when hitting heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: I've worn it about 10 times now and it does a good job at keeping my rotator cuff from bothering me when I punch the heavy bag. I can see how it might be hard for some to put on by themselves but I've figured it out. I do sweat a lot, and this is winter in Maine, but it's very much worth it for the support it gives.
customer_reviews.author: bay driver

customer_reviews.title: Declining quality
customer_reviews.text: We had an older one of these but my husband wanted a spare since he has to wear it so often, ordered this one and within a month the Velcro stopped holding yet the older one that's been worn and washed hundreds of times throughout the year is still going strong... Not impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kim T

customer_reviews.title: Brace came with two rips. ..cannot use..need a replacement... Damaged. ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS SECOND ORDER CAME AN THE BRACE HAD TWO BIG RIPS IN THE VALCRO ON TWO MAJOR PLACES..SO I NEED TO SEND THIS BAC AN GET A REPLACEMENT. PLEASE EXAMINE BEFORE SENDING. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: JB BECKER

customer_reviews.title: "Velcro" strap doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: After a year, the main velcro strap doesn't hold anymore. The material on the shoulder where the strap attaches has become very soft and now the strap will not attach there rendering it unusable. What is the warranty on this product? I bought it one year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pratte

customer_reviews.title: Worked with it on and it felt great. I bought 2 (different brand for other shoulder) ...
customer_reviews.text: (hubby's words) Relieved the pressure off the shoulder. Worked with it on and it felt great. I bought 2 (different brand for other shoulder) to compare which one was better, well it was def this one!!!! Stayed in place.
customer_reviews.author: jeanie stoutenberg

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: very good quality, comfortable and easy to wear, but for who has problems with ac shoulder separation (acromioclavicular disjunction Type III) is not recommended, in fact neither for Type I nor Type II. I not recommend wearing in the first 6 weeks. I gave 4 stars because I had an exchange of emails with DHL that demanded a lot of documents and customs fees even though Amazone had already kept them paying.
customer_reviews.author: Razvan

customer_reviews.title: This helps.  I'll be buying a second.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for husband he dislocated shoulder, did damage, and never got it fixed. This helps. Buy 2 if you can for those hot sweaty days so you can put on a dry one.
customer_reviews.author: Riverside Park Campground

customer_reviews.title: Made Well
customer_reviews.text: The item is made well but it just didn't do anything to help my shoulder pain at all.
customer_reviews.author: Whithker Bithcuit

customer_reviews.title: Order smaller than you need, itll be tight at first, but if you're active in it itll stretch out
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Extremely uncomfortable on hot days as I have to wear a tshirt under it to keep from aggrivateing my skin, but need to have my company shirt completely visible. I ordered a large but recieved a small which worked out since after wearing it to work only twice it stretched out quite a bit
customer_reviews.author: nicholas wettstein

customer_reviews.title: Not Made for Women
customer_reviews.text: The netting is too firm, and it doesn't work with boobs at all. Not made with a woman's body in mind (one boob out. one boob squished (covered).
customer_reviews.author: Teri J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit although it's quite a bit thicker and thus ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a different EVS for several years, needing a replacement so purchased this one. Nice unit although it's quite a bit thicker and thus makes you sweat quickly. Like the adjustments on this one and fact can put on and off easier with better closure straps. Can't really beat EVS products...
customer_reviews.author: Coach J

customer_reviews.title: Great design cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Great design and works great first couple of times. Then the material falls apart. Very cheap material. Tried three separate braces because it works so well at first and I was hoping it was just a defective one. Had to switch to the Neo G it's not as good a design but the material is much better made.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegoose54

customer_reviews.title: Product fits great and feels good and tight on my dislocating shoulder ...
customer_reviews.text: Product fits great and feels good and tight on my dislocating shoulder issues. I used to when I ride dirt bikes in the mountains. I just used it again for the 3 or 4th time and the backing started to come off. The material that the straps Velcro to is coming off the padding. I doesn't look like it can be fixed either with is a big bummer as i really need this and spent the extra money on what i thought was going to be a good brace... If they would try to make things right i would be satisfied with this product.but unfortunately not..
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Runs small order next size bigger! The support is great
customer_reviews.author: C Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, durability is an issue.
customer_reviews.text: The brace works well but the arm strap gets torn off while wearing during football. Had to replace after just one season.
customer_reviews.author: RWL

customer_reviews.title: Great support for lifting.
customer_reviews.text: As comfortable and stability providing of a shoulder brace as any I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Welch

customer_reviews.title: Also the unit gets pretty warm. So if you plan on wearing it ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally I purchased the medium sized brace. However, I have large biceps and it was too restrictive and cut off circulation. I returned it and ordered the large. It fits well around the arm, shoulder, and upper chest. But with the more narrow mid section, the lower chest portion is almost too big. This causes the brace to shift around during the day. Also the unit gets pretty warm. So if you plan on wearing it for any length of time, think about putting powder on or taking it off from time to time to let it and yourself cool off.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua May

customer_reviews.title: Back in the goalie box thanks to the EVS Sports Brace
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son who had injured his shoulder playing soccer. He had a subluxation type injury and this gave him the confidence to be back in playing goalie after a week of rest and a couple of weeks of physical therapy. He is about 5'9 and weighs an athletic 165 pounds. He would not need a bigger size. He probably could have worn a medium but when we looked at the specs for the medium similar product he did not like them so he stayed with this and it worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Skimom

customer_reviews.title: It Works for Baseball
customer_reviews.text: The strap does seem to help. It reassures me when I'm playing baseball. I dislocated my shoulder diving in baseball and three weeks later I was back on the field with this brace. This brace just reminds me that I can take the risk of diving without worrying about it popping out again. Also this product does not restrict my range of motion too at all as I swing or play catch. Great brace for baseball users.
customer_reviews.author: price2125

customer_reviews.title: Not as supportive as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while ago because I recently dislocated my shoulder and wanted to use this whenever I played basketball. Positves: - Very lightweight - Pretty comfortable for a shoulder brace - Keeps shoulder locked in - You're always reminded you have it on which will help you be more careful of hurting your shoulder Negatives: - Not exactly the most supportive brace - Runs a bit larger than the guidelines say. I'm 5'7", 160 lbs and pretty well built. I wish I got a medium though All in all, it gets the job done. Just don't expect it to prevent a shoulder injury. Serves more as a reminder to be careful since you know it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Macas

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product, but the size chart is deceiving and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, but the size chart is deceiving and we had to return the first one because it was too big. The good thing? returning was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my shoulder and this brace really helps ease the pain. Quite impressed! I do start hurting more with it off so It's definitely working. *UPDATE* After wearing it daily it didn't last more than a couple months before the cloth was coming apart from the velcro being taken on and off. Ordering a new one now almost 2 years later after developing issues with my other shoulder since I had such good results with pain the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been having should problems for about 4 years. Two operations later. it still hurts from time to time and needs support. I've tried the new KT tapes and they work great for short periods of time. The shoulder brace really takes the pressure off the joint and supports the arm to minimize the discomfort. Excellent job EVS, great design, wish you thought of it sooner. It would have saved many uncomfortable days and night. Bob
customer_reviews.author: PercMan694

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and durable.... used for a very rough and aggressive football player after shoulder surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi harris

customer_reviews.title: It’s... okay
customer_reviews.text: After looking at other reviews about how amazing this brace is, I decided to purchase for my son who has a torn labrum. I can confirm that it is just “eh”. Not extremely stable. However one thing I will tell you is, if you are in the middle of a size range, get the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Dilworth

customer_reviews.title: All in all I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: I play football so my shoulder is always being challenged. This product really kept it in place! You could feel it was there, but it made you more confident that it had your back! Only thing I would say is that it can get a little ichy after a while, but that might just be me! All in all I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Perez

customer_reviews.title: Not for longterm use
customer_reviews.text: The brace is helpfull, but the fabric Where the velcro attaches became loose on both the arm and the chest and lost ALL grip and now its basically useless in less than 2 months. I bought this product because I need it for my shoulder and now I cant even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful for stability. Excellent for nerve crush/palsy.
customer_reviews.text: I have an unstable shoulder d/t dislocation. This sling didn't do much for stability. It DID help a patient with a stinger/nerve stretch injury with the shoulder. Used with the right injury this sling is great.
customer_reviews.author: Denver P. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: In the beginning it was great but after use well it started to fall apart ...
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning it was great but after use well it started to fall apart right underneath of arm. Just need to have better matieral. Had to repair it as you can see pictures. But started to tear gain. This product actually does help me with my shoulder problem. So that's why I gave it a 2....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for BJJ injury
customer_reviews.text: Dislocated shoulder during live training Jiu Jitsu, kept training for 2 weeks... Shoulder slipped out constantly. Went back after a couple weeks, still slipping out of socket. Bought brace and no more problems when I'm training!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I loosen it I can fit a nice pack under it and it holds the ice in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brace because the reviews stated it fits women, which I found not to be entirely true. The brace does help relieve shoulder pain. If I loosen it I can fit a nice pack under it and it holds the ice in place. I would not wear it outdoors in the heat as it is warm and somewhat bulky. I gave it 4 stars because it works.
customer_reviews.author: Judith White

customer_reviews.title: So so...
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable and stabilizes the shoulder well but glue seperated from velcro on each end. Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Kman

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated and time consuming to put on
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but a little too complicated and time consuming to put on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoulder support
customer_reviews.text: After years of dislocating my should, multiple rotator cuff tears, this support adds the support needed for confidence in my shoulder again. After a few minutes with it on I completely forgot about it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable as far as braces are concerned. Fits well and gives my shoulder the support it needs. I have had 2 shoulder surgeries and this is something I got when my shoulder started to hurt again. I only wear it when I feel like I need the support and it takes the pain and instability away for me. It is not a magic sleeve but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: RTP23

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly well for me. I had been experiencing severe shoulder pain due to my occupation. I started wearing this and after a couple months my shoulder pain was gone. I haven't used it since but I definitely will if the pain returns. Great product! My only complaint is that it holds in heat so one can get awfully sweaty wearing it during physical work. But....it is totally worth the minor discomfort!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Powers

customer_reviews.title: I have hypermobility of the joints and tendons and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have hypermobility of the joints and tendons and I bought this product to keep my shoulder from randomly dislocating. The brace gave me instant relief and support; however, I intend to use this product while working. Let's just say the material wasn't man enough to handle a single days shift from a mechanics standpoint. Now I am searching for a similar design but one made from a more rugged material. I give it a 2 for effort.
customer_reviews.author: CorJFexd

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just a little small
customer_reviews.text: Great brace but had to return it for a larger size. Husband was a 43 so if you are a 43 I suggest going with the XL
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Winters

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This brace is fantastic. It allows me to continue lifting heavy wieght despite a partially torn labrum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to add loop velcro on the brace side
customer_reviews.text: Bought in june 2018.. the velcro is no longer keeping the brace secure to my body anymore... I would like to send back have a replacement sent out please...
customer_reviews.author: Todd Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoulder Brace.
customer_reviews.text: This brace worked as well as I had hoped or expected. I had a torn bicep tendon and blown out shoulder (rotator cuff, labrum, etc.). Prior to surgery, this brace allowed me to continue working without my arm feeling like it was going to fall off. It maintains compression on the shoulder joint for a secure feeling. Comfortable when worn over a tight fitting, high-tech fabric, long sleeve shirt, as shown.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: This held my shoulder in place and sped up the ...
customer_reviews.text: This held my shoulder in place and sped up the healing process, and therefore I am extremely grateful. The only downside to this brace is that the adhesion of the velcro does wane with use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stabilizer
customer_reviews.text: I really probably should have surgery to fix my shoulder, but between several visits to the chiropractor and using the brace for stabilisation, it ache considerably less
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great support just don't put in washer
customer_reviews.text: My son wore this brace and said it really helped him, however, the brace went into the washer and it fell apart and became useless. Overall a great brace and support but DO NOT place in a washer.
customer_reviews.author: PdV

customer_reviews.title: works good!
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, not as rigid as I was hoping it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney A Turner

customer_reviews.title: Works great, yet too small!
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviews, the product itself is great but the arm is too small. You have to order bigger size. It totally blocked my arm arteries and was so painful. I was depending on it to heal me quickly but it is too painful to wear. Couldn't do an exchange for a different size and had to intiate a return and reorder. Could have been great but the size made it a painful experience!!
customer_reviews.author: Hussein Aboubakr

customer_reviews.title: Has really helped my shoulder
customer_reviews.text: My shoulder has been hurting for months and this brace is the only thing that has stopped the pain. I’m finally sleeping thru the night
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: This Brace Has Kept Me Wakeboarding
customer_reviews.text: I've had three of these over the last 15 years. It's been the one piece of equipment that's kept me in wakeboarding after having my lead shoulder rebuilt. I'm 6' 180lbs medium build and wear a large. It sucks my shoulder back and tightens my shoulder blade keeping my posture correct. It also greatly reduces the yank on a hard landing or crash keeping my shoulder where it should be - thank you EVS.
customer_reviews.author: FaFam

customer_reviews.title: Superior to the others I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: Secures to the body and is able to restrict movement much better than the others I tried. Use for boxing & martial arts mostly
customer_reviews.author: Erin Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: My husband says that the construction and material are good. (I like that the velcro fastener has a ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband says that the construction and material are good. (I like that the velcro fastener has a hard cover so you have something to hold on to position it and it doesn't fray.) He says the shoulder stabilizer helps his shoulder and fits. He did think that the chest size ran small but it does fit. It would have been better if there were instructions instead of just the pictures on the box. It only took two days to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i had order a medium and have to exchanged for ...
customer_reviews.text: i had order a medium and have to exchanged for a larger size. the larger size came in but it was been used i guess someone returned it and now i got someone else shoulder brace now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bordin P.

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable at times but works
customer_reviews.text: I have had the brace now for 3 days and wear it at work (12 hrs a day) under a tshirt. you need to wear a shirt under it for comfort but it does get hot. strap that goes around bicep has a tendency to bunch up under arm and "d" ring turns so uncomfortable under arm.Not sure how well it will work yet, but does seem to stabilize my shoulder some. Maybe wearing an elastic neoprene shoulder sleeve would help with comfort.
customer_reviews.author: paul d whitford

customer_reviews.title: Came apart quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Was working great, but only had it since Friday (4 days total) and the Velcro came off.
customer_reviews.author: Nazeer J Aljuwani III

customer_reviews.title: Good and very well built
customer_reviews.text: Good and very well built! Great quality and great support. The only downside to this is that I don't know what will happen to it after you wash it and I am afraid that it might get ruined cause of all the velcro on there...
customer_reviews.author: Web Tipster

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoulder subluxation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend who has permanent subluxation of his shoulder due to nerve damage. This product has given him the best relief he’s had in almost a year. Definitely a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Zoya A.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SUPPORT!
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS SHOULDER BRACE TO HELP PROVIDE SHOULDER AND ARM SUPPORT TO MY RIGHT SIDE WHICH WAS WEAKEN DUE TO A STROKE. IT PROVIDES GOOD SUPPORT WHILE OUT AND ABOUT CONDUCTING CHORES. YES, I WOULD RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence parker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.  Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Would be a good design and work great, if only it was made with good material. I wore it for one day. The day that I received it in the mail. At the end of the day it broke on me. Tore right at the arm. I don't recommend this product at all. Get something else. This thing won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Mykey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. My husband really needed this brace after he dislocated his shoulder. It held well and breathed. The only down side is after a few gentle washes it started to tear in the seams. If they would reenforce the seams this would be a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee-Chong

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep my mans shoulder in place when he’s roofing!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I had a dislocated left shoulder in july of 2013, was enjoying the sling i got from the hospital to much and bought one of these. Loved it, gave me more mobility and a faster recovery time. I still use from time to time when I go to the gym for heavy lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, evaluate your needs first
customer_reviews.text: I had to return as it did not afford my son the stability he needed after one labrum repair and the other shoulder unstable. It is a quality product, just be advised if your shoulder pops out this will NOT hold it in!
customer_reviews.author: Vegasmom

customer_reviews.title: I originally ordered a medium I have a 38" Chest ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a medium I have a 38" Chest and it was way to small. I sent it back and got the large. Fits perfectly. Cant wait for it to warm up so I can ride my DH bike!
customer_reviews.author: KC Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice brace
customer_reviews.text: Very nice brace, it really holds the shoulder in place.
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but wish it rode higher toward neck.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Wish it rode higher on the collar toward the neck. One of the things it is good for is relieving the strain of carrying straps of computer bags and luggage on the shoulder. It would do better in this if it rode higher.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

product_meta.title: EVS Sports SB03 Shoulder Brace (Large)
product_meta.description: EVS' innovative shoulder support system adding the X-Strap technology for superior stabilization and compression.
feature_bullets: Provides increased level of support and compression
New adjustable arm closure design eliminates underarm chaffing: Fits arms of all sizes
Universal no snag design fits left and right shoulders; Easy on/off design on left and right sides
Breathable air mesh construction with TPR gripper pull-tabs
X-strap technology system includes the EVS shoulder support system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars471 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
